ForewordÂ¶

circuits was a reincarnation of a design architecture that the author had been working on since mid-2004. It was then part of the pymills project (named so after the author) and was just a single module: pymills.event

It was an architecture inspired from learning Behavior Trees while studying Software Engineering at Griffith University and quickly grew into a useful and successful framework to build more complex systems and applications with.

circuits became what it is today by the encouragement of a co-worker of a start-up company at the time and was rebranded into it’s own project.
